Fedi.Directory10/6/2022

Interesting accounts to follow on Mastodon and the Fediverse

data.htmlText:
Skip to primary content

Fedi.Directory

Main menu

  • Browse Directory
  • Top 100 Topics
  • How To Use This Site
  • Getting Listed

A small human-curated selection of interesting accounts to help you get started, or just to spice up your timeline.

  • Computing & Technology

Electronics, FOSS, smartphones…

  • Science & Humanities

Astronomy, engineering, history…

  • Games

Video games, RPGs, board games…

  • Lifestyle & Hobbies

Crafts, food & drink, cycling…

  • Nature & Animals

Environment, pets, wildlife…

  • Art

Watercolours, CGI, art history…

  • Society

Events, governments, campaign groups…

  • Culture & Entertainment

Books, films & TV, music…

  • Other Languages

Deutsch, Français, Español…

  • Local & Regional

European Union, United States, Australia…

Can’t find what you want? Fedi.Directory generally lists public accounts about specific topics. If you’re looking for more personal accounts that cover a wider range of topics, try the excellent Trunk ⧉ and Fediverse.info ⧉ instead!
